content: Enable a knowledge base for AI agents. The system will index your documents using the {{modelName}} model to support question-based search through your data. This feature focuses on finding relevant information but doesn't generate summaries or perform global analysis.

comment.text: This text describes the Knowledge Base feature for AI agents. It explains that enabling this feature allows the system to index documents for question-based search using a specified AI model and clarifies that it focuses on information retrieval, not summarization or global analysis. It appears as a description within the AI settings section of the Portal Settings.
